subject: Final Closed Beta丨Registration Now Open
content:
Dear Travelers，


I am aware of how desperately you all are to re-enter Teyvat, and after discussing this possibility with our developers for what seemed like an eternity, the registration for the Final Closed Beta is now open!

(♡´艸`)

Furthermore, the long awaited Beta on the PlayStation® will also be available this time! I can't wait to see how amazing it will be to play Genshin Impact on console.

Well, what are you waiting for?? Click the link down below and sign up for the Beta now ~ (。･∀･)ﾉ


-Register Here-

https://genshin.mihoyo.com/en


-FAQ-

https://genshin.mihoyo.com/en/news/detail/3334


※PLEASE NOTE:

1. Before completing this form, you must first register a miHoYo account. Afterwards, you must confirm that you have linked this account to an email address. Otherwise, you will not be able to enter the selection pool for beta test access.

2. You must complete a new registration form to be considered for the Final Closed Beta, even if you have registered for previous Genshin Impact closed beta tests in the past. This is a different registration from that used in the previous beta test.

3. We suggest that you use the latest versions of the Chrome, Firefox or Safari browsers to fill this form in.
